description: First differences of A003188 (decimal equivalent of the Gray Code).
comments: Multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2^e, a(p^e) = (-1)^((p^e-1)/2) otherwise. - _Mitch Harris_, May 17 2005a(A091072(n)) > 0; a(A091067(n)) < 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 28 2012In the binary representation of n, clear everything left of the least significant 1 bit, and negate if the bit left of it was set originally. - _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 23 2013This sequence is the trace of n in the minimal alternating binary representation of n (defined at A256696). - _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 07 2015
